test.name: net.shipilev.concurrent.torture.tests.primitiveAtomicity.DoubleAtomicityTest
test.description: Tests if primitive doubles experience non-atomic updates.

case.description: Default value for the field. Observers are allowed to see the default value for the field, because there is the data race between reader and writer.
The value set by the actor thread. Observer sees the complete update.
Seeing the torn value. This is specifically allowed by JLS 17.7. This is not a surprising behavior on some 32-bit systems which do not have full-width 64-bit instructions.
